column1: Smoque BBQ////Got to Smoque for the first time this week
column2: and have to say it underwhelmed me more than I thought it would. I still liked the chopped brisket sandwich I got
column3: but I would only get it a la carte next time
column4: and skip getting it with slaw and 1 side($2 extra). The cole slaw was unfortunately the type that is drenched with too much vinegar(a la M Henry)
column5: and I really wished the mac and cheese was a slightly bigger portion.
